Values.ClientId: {Enter Application ID of registered native App in Gateway AAD}
Values.NativeUserName: {Enter Service Account username present as guest user in Gateway AAD}
Values.NativeUserPassword: {Enter Service Account password present as guest user in Gateway AAD}
Values.Resource: {Enter the URL of the Resource for which access token is needed}
Values.CertificateThumbprint: {The thumprint of the certificate installed in Cert Store and intended to be used as client certificate}
